title: Community chat view keeps throwing errors when not yet joined
body:
Here's the  scenario:

1. @iurimatias invited me to an encrypted community with that already has many messages in invidividual channels
2. I "got to community" and enter the community view

My logs then go bananas:

```
ERR 2023-01-17 15:57:26.265+01:00 error doing rpc request                    topics="rpc" tid=2700145 file=core.nim:33 methodName=wakuext_messageByMessageID exception="\nstatus-go error [methodName:wakuext_messageByMessageID, code:-32000, message:record not found ]\n"                                                                                                                  ERR 2023-01-17 15:57:26.265+01:00 error:                                     topics="messages-service" tid=2700145 file=service.nim:513 procName=getDetailsForMessage errName=RpcException errD
esription="\nstatus-go error [methodName:wakuext_messageByMessageID, code:-32000, message:record not found ]\n"                                                                                
DBG 2023-01-17 15:57:26.273+01:00 NewBE_callPrivateRPC                       topics="rpc" tid=2700145 file=core.nim:20 rpc_method=wakuext_messageByMessageID                                   ERR 2023-01-17 15:57:26.274+01:00 rpc response error                         topics="rpc" tid=2700145 file=core.nim:29 err="\nstatus-go error [methodName:wakuext_messageByMessageID, code:-320
00, message:record not found ]\n"                                                                                                                                                              ERR 2023-01-17 15:57:26.274+01:00 error doing rpc request                    topics="rpc" tid=2700145 file=core.nim:33 methodName=wakuext_messageByMessageID exception="\nstatus-go error [meth
odName:wakuext_messageByMessageID, code:-32000, message:record not found ]\n"                                                                                                                  ERR 2023-01-17 15:57:26.275+01:00 error:                                     topics="messages-service" tid=2700145 file=service.nim:513 procName=getDetailsForMessage errName=RpcException errD
esription="\nstatus-go error [methodName:wakuext_messageByMessageID, code:-32000, message:record not found ]\n"                                                                                DBG 2023-01-17 15:57:26.275+01:00 NewBE_callPrivateRPC                       topics="rpc" tid=2700145 file=core.nim:20 rpc_method=wakuext_messageByMessageID                                   
ERR 2023-01-17 15:57:26.276+01:00 rpc response error                         topics="rpc" tid=2700145 file=core.nim:29 err="\nstatus-go error [methodName:wakuext_messageByMessageID, code:-32000, message:record not found ]\n"                                                                                                                                                              
ERR 2023-01-17 15:57:26.276+01:00 error doing rpc request                    topics="rpc" tid=2700145 file=core.nim:33 methodName=wakuext_messageByMessageID exception="\nstatus-go error [methodName:wakuext_messageByMessageID, code:-32000, message:record not found ]\n"                                                                                                                  
ERR 2023-01-17 15:57:26.276+01:00 error: 
```

The app seems to keep requesting this ^

After restarting the app it stops doing that, also when entering the same community view.
